channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WitherCubes

item.title: Biology - How do organisms reproduce
item.description: How do organisms reproduce Reproduction The ability of an organism to produce offspring or young ones or new organism is known as reproduction The process by which living organism produce offspring of their own kind is known as reproduction Each organism has certain life span. Life Span The time period between birth to death is called life span.

item.title: Chemistry - Chemical reactions and equations
item.description: Chemical reactions and equations MathJax = { tex: { inlineMath: [['$', '$'], ["\\(", "\\)"]], processEscapes: true, } } Physical Change Chemical Change Change in state Milk —> Curd $$H_2O(s) \implies H_2O(l) \implies H_2O(g)$$ $$Iron \implies \frac{O_2}{H_2O}\implies Rust$$ Cutting of wood Burning of wood Crushing of paper Digestion of food ——————– Burning of candle is both physical and chemical change ——————–

item.title: Physics - Light
item.description: Light Optics It’s a branch of physics which describes about phenomenon and laws associated with generation and propagation of light, its interaction with the matter called optics. Optics are classified into two types Ray Optics Physical Optics Ray Optics It treats the propagation of light in terms of rays and is valid if only the wavelength of the light is much smaller than the size of the obstacle.

item.title: Secure the Firefox Web Browser
item.description: Most Firefox users think that firefox has security and privacy features out of the box. The answer is that it’s certainly better compared to other mainstream alternatives (like Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome). Why do people trust that Firefox more in terms of security and privacy than Google Chrome? The answer is simple because Firefox is a Free and Open Source Software. This means that anyone can audit the code of firefox and submit bug fixes, exploits to improve firefox and inspect the code if any malicious code is there in the browser.

item.title: Softwate I use
item.description: Operating System I use Arch Linux as my operating system. I was once a Windows 10 user but then hated it after knowing how evil it is. I wish I could use Gentoo as my OS but I have a dumb laptop to compile and I love the AUR. Programs Web Browser For my web browser I use Brave. It is better than any proprietary alternatives like Google Chrome, Vivaldi, and Microsoft Edge because Brave doesn’t collect user data and sell it.
